ygData.subject: My thought on how the guy got the book...
ygData.msgSnippet: Now I m not saying anyone is a cheater but... If you have all these people looking for the book and it can t be found its most likely not in the game yet. As
ygData.messageBody:
Now I'm not saying anyone is a cheater but... If you have all these people
looking for the book and it can't be found its most likely not in the game yet.

As you may of heard people have been working on an eq emu.
And as you may have known there is a command to summon items, each item has
a number. some people where summoning items starting from 0001 or soemthing
and working their way up. Baiscly I think that someone was summoning items
and ran across the book. And blam history is made.

It would explaine why the person hasn't said where the book its and/or how
to get it.
-Dave
